creditline: Gift of Stanley and Lucile Slocum
inscription:
Inscription; Mark

in pencil, lower center verso (Late 19th or early 20th century hand): [Marmion/6]
markings: crown surmouting shield (lower section cut off at left edge of sheet), on watermark [same as .16 and .22 which completes it]
portfolio: From Scott's Marmion, one of forty pencil drawings from a sketchbook.
title: Combat of Two Soldiers, and Two Horses
